atomic_scoped_ptr< T > Class Template Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<typename T>
class atomic_scoped_ptr< T >

This is an atomic variant of boost::scoped_ptr<>. atomic_scoped_ptr<> can be shared among threads by the use of swap() as the argument. That is, a destructive read. Use atomic_shared_ptr<> for non-destructive reading. The implementation relies on an atimic-swap machine code, e.g. lock xchg.
See also:
atomic_shared_ptr

Member Function Documentation

template<typename T>
void atomic_scoped_ptr< T >::swap (  atomic_scoped_ptr< T > &  x  )  [inline]
 

Parameters:
x x is atomically swapped. Nevertheless, this object is not atomically replaced. That is, the object pointed by "this" must not be shared among threads.
